extendedInfo.description: FREE! View native Microsoft Word, Excel and PowerPoint files & attachments with Documents To Go Main App. Supported file formats include .doc,. docx,. xls,. xlsx,. ppt,. pptx.#1 SELLING OFFICE APP!Over 25 million downloads and 750,000 paying customers!Looking to edit your documents as well?   Docs To Go Full Version Key is on SALE NOW for $14.99(normally $29.99, a 50% discount!)When purchased the Full Version Key unlocks the ability to:â¢Edit , View & Create Microsoft Word, Excel, & PowerPoint files & high fidelity viewing of your PDFsâ¢Supports password protected Word & Excel 97-2010 filesâ¢Google Docs! Download, view & edit your files from Google Docs directly in Docs To Go.â¢Desktop App for bi-directional sync with your deviceâs USB cable.  Seamlessly move files from device to computer using our new, & FREE desktop app.The DataViz AdvantageDocs To Go, now in its 14th year, is developed by DataViz, Inc., a producer of quality software for Windows & Mac for over 29 years.  In addition to the Android platform, Documents To Go is also currently available for iPhone, Blackberry & Symbian S60More info on Full Version Featuresâ¦â¢Word To Go includes rich formatting features including bold, italics, underline, font color, alignment, bulleted & numbered lists, tables, bookmarks, comments, footnotes, endnotes, track-changes, word count, find & replace, etc.â¢Sheet To Go offers powerful data computation with support for 111 functions, cell, number & sheet formatting, row & column preferences, auto-fit options, freeze panes, sort, cut, copy, paste, undo, redo, charting, etc. â¢Slideshow To Go allows you to effortlessly âflickâ through slides, review notes, rehearse timing & make last minute changes to presentations on the go. â¢PDF To Go provides high-fidelity viewing of important reference materials with options for page view, word wrap, auto-rotate, bookmarks, search, select & copy text, and more... â¢Google Docs Support Download, view & edit your files from Google Docs directly in Docs To Go. Any changes you make can be saved & synched back to Google Docs so that you'll always have the most up-to-date version. You can even create new files in Docs To Go & upload them immediately to your account. â¢Desktop Sync:  Transfer files from your Windows PC to your Android device over USB. Any edits made in either location will automatically sync & 100% of the original file formatting will be maintained via our Intact Technology.â¢Total access with support for attachments, password-protected files, built-in file browser, memory card support, & new Live Folder for recently used documents â¢Localized in English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Japanese, Turkish, Russian, Polish, Czech and Arabic and traditional and simplified Chinese Why Documents To Go?â¢Full featured   Documents To Go is not just a viewer, it's a complete solution with a full range of viewing AND editing features. Simply unlock premium features by purchasing the 'Full Version Key' from the Android Market.â¢First to market Documents To Go is the first mobile Office suite for Android that supports editing of native Microsoft Word, Excel & PowerPoint files! â¢Powered by InTact Technology. DataViz' acclaimed technology ensures all original file formatting is retained once a file has been edited on an Android device & then forwarded on.â¢Send & receive attachments. Documents To Go is tightly integrated with Gmail & other e-mail applications like RoadSync for quick & easy native attachment downloading & sending. â¢Native. Open Word & Excel files on your Android phone without any desktop or server conversion needed. â¢Nothing new to learn. Documents To Go was designed & developed with the Android device user in mind - everything from the menus to the touchscreen to trackball is supported for a familiar look and feel.

reviews.title: User friendly
reviews.comment: The most accommodating and user friendly app for my 10.1 tablet which syncronizes with my laptop as well...
reviews.author: Corry Roberts

reviews.title: Whats going on?
reviews.comment: I just tried making a purchase, updating to pro. My account has been deducted, however, I am having error problems with the installation. Am told my payment has been declined. Please do something for I really need the app
reviews.author: Elikplim Akorli

reviews.comment: Excellent app. BUT WHAT HAPPEN I PURCHASED PAID VERSION FOR. 9.99 U R ON SELL...Cannot open mi doc. Pls do something.. Lost my old file due to mi lock
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Full Version is Great
reviews.comment: The full version is wonderful.  The trial has very little you can do to see if you will like it or not though.  And their support team is super slooooow.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Now fixed & Great again
reviews.comment: Purchased this a while ago.  Desktop 2 Go version will no-longer connect to devices due to Android 4.1 upgrades.  Whole point in purchase was to be able to sync via desktop PC. If you want to sync with Android 4+ ver, then avoid this programme.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Meh - no Dropbox support
reviews.comment: iPad users have access to Dropbox, but not Android tablet owners. What\'s up Dataviz? Get on that please.  Also, an autosave function on documents being edited would be helpful in case the tablet needs to be switched off. I\'ve lost lots of notes by not saving through the antiquated file menu at the end of a meeting, etc.  Dropbox is mandatory.
reviews.author: David Churbuck

reviews.title: verst for micromax A series phones
reviews.comment: verst for micromax A series phones ,it only asks u to subscribe or buy the product, are DataViz, Inc.Top Developer ... CRAZY, fools you tag the application as free, software developers are out of their mind to tag it as FREE on google PLAY applications
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Twice now I have tried to create a new document on this app and in about the second paragraph it freezes up, closes, and I lose my work. This is even poorer than when i tried it on BlackBerry. Avoid.
reviews.author: Mark Stone

reviews.title: Works great but...
reviews.comment: Will give 5 stars when it can be used in windows mode. This type of app above all others needs this type of functionality.
reviews.author: James Lecouffe

reviews.title: poor customer service
reviews.comment: i cannot sync between my computer and my external SD card & i ask help. i receive a series of standard replies and finally it\'s a blame on my device. anyway, i find apps that is easy to sync with my external SD card and i quit to use the sync function.
reviews.author: Alfred Hung

reviews.title: all u can do is view..
reviews.comment: the free version just has the view option..ofcorse didn\'t expect it to support all features in the free version, but it should have provided a basic editing feature.disappointed
reviews.author: Subhadip Chatterjee

reviews.title: Poor
reviews.comment: Google spreadsheet Spreedsheet locked due to incompatibility in formulas....not expecting this error on a document created on google. I bought the app mainly for editing google docs but can\'t do that anymore. Will update the star rating when this is fixed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect.
reviews.comment: Perfect. Able to read all formats, smooth, fast. I recommend it for everyone.
reviews.author: Mike M

reviews.title: Hopeless trial version
reviews.comment: Sorry, I can\'t tell if this app is good or not.  I ran the free trial version and all I\'m getting is ads and unwanted mails.  Please get your priorities sorted; I\'m happy to pay for software I like and use.  Can\'t people do time-limited trial versions?  The app has even hung my Galaxy on uninstall!
reviews.author: Friedrich FO

reviews.title: Broke after my XOOM  upgraded to Jelly Bean
reviews.comment: STILL BROKEN --> This all started to happen after I received the Jelly Bean update for the Android OS on my Motorola XOOM tablet. The Documents To Go (DTG) desktop application on my computer used to synchronize fine with my Motorola XOOM tablet. However, when I tried to sync it today (July 29, 2012), the DTG desktop application on my computer cannot see my XOOM tablet connected via USB (Status: Disconnected). On the contrary, Windows does recognize the tablet as a media device (MTP) under My Computer.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: your apt just erased all of my music in all my pictures of my children what am I supposed to do to get them back now\thow do I get seven gigs of music and eight years of pictures of my children back on my sd card in your app erased everything what the f***
reviews.author: William D. Murray III

reviews.title: Getting better...
reviews.comment: Desktop sync for GS3 functional so moving back to 4 stars.  Would still like to see Dropbox along with other cloud services as an option to access fron within the app besides just Google Drive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very smart apps
reviews.comment: This is very useful apps to  open any ms office file. i give five point out of five po int.
reviews.author: Chandra Pal

reviews.title: limited
reviews.comment: more features should be added, like fill color for text so we can highlight important text from d document. as well as bookmarking features.
reviews.author: Sab Datu

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Great app, really nice design, easy to use. Everything is good but... you cant edit anything unless you buy premium for it (about $15).
